entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 12:47 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:21 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:21 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:21 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
